main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted near Mendocino, California on August 25, 1952. It was described as cigar-shaped and larger than any known aircraft, traveling at high speed.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for about 20 minutes and appeared to change shape and color, alternating between darker and lighter shades., The observers included military personnel who classified the object as not being any known aircraft., The sighting involved high-performance maneuvers with unusual climbing and hovering capabilities., The weather conditions during the sighting were clear, with no clouds., There were no sounds reported during the sighting, which occurred around dusk.
